== Name

asciidoctor-go - the Go module to parse the AsciiDoc markup.

== Synopsis

*asciidoctor-go* [_OPTION_]... _FILE_...

== Ordered list

. Item 1.
+
Description for item 1.

. Item 2
+
--
Literal block inside Item 2,
----
Literal block.
----
--

. Item 3
+
--
Unordered list inside item 3,

* Sub item 3.1
* Sub item 3.2
--

. Item 4
.. Item 4.1
.. Item 4.2

== Unordered list

* Item 1.
+
Description for item 1.

* Item 2
+
--
Literal block inside Item 2,

----
Literal block.
----
--

* Item 3
+
--
Ordered list inside unordered item 3,

. Sub item 3.1
. Sub item 3.2
--

* Item 4
** Item 4.1
** Item 4.2


== Description list

Item 1::
+
Description for item 1.

Item 2::
+
--
Literal block inside Item 2,

----
Literal block.
----
--

Item 3::
+
--
Unordered list inside item 3,

* Sub item 3.1
* Sub item 3.2
--
